name: GoGodot3: Evochine
description:
Go collect evo dust to evolve by using the evo machine.

Kill the enemies by using your sword.

Controls:

Movement:

Up: W / Arrow Up

Down: S / Arrow Down

Left: A / Arrow Left

Right: D / Arrow Right

Sword:

Rotate Left: Q

Rotate Right: E

Misc:

Deposit: Enter/ Space

Tp To Machine (U Should Have more then 5 hp to use): R

ByTheWay Imonten is SUS
